document.full_text: a day after celebrating a pact for palestinian unity, khaled meshal declined to swear off violence or agree that a palestinian state would produce an end to the conflict with israel.
document.title: hamas leader calls for two-state solution, but refuses to renounce violence
lines_and_colors: a day after celebrating a pact for palestinian unity, khaled meshal declined to swear off violence or agree that a palestinian state would produce an end to the conflict with israel.
